DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare treatment effect two treatment regimen Cat-PAD v placebo evaluate treatment effect Cat-PAD symptom , rescue medication usage Quality Life .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Male female , age 1265 year . Moderate severe rhinoconjunctivitis exposure cat least 2 year . Subjects may optionally also GINA Step 1 control asthma . Positive skin prick test cat hair . Cat dander specific IgE â‰¥0.35 kU/L . Exclusion Criteria Asthma fall GINA definition `` partly control '' `` uncontrolled '' Steps 2 5 . FEV1 < 80 % predict . Clinically significant confounding symptom allergy seasonal allergen final evaluation period . Skin prick test 5 mm great negative control perennial allergen animal dander ( cat ) avoid study . Significant symptoms another clinically relevant illness likely affect score rhinoconjunctivitis symptom . Clinically relevant abnormality detect physical examination . History severe drug allergy , severe angioedema anaphylactic reaction food .
